text: Sir Michael Louis David Fabricant (born 12 June 1950) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament for Mid Staffordshire from 1992 to 1997. He has been the MP for Lichfield since 1997. ==Early life== Fabricant was born in Brighton into a Jewish family. He went to Brighton Secondary Technical School. title: Michael Fabricant
